name: Grow Up! - A Worm Game
description:
Grow Up! - A Worm Game is about a worm-like creature from space, trying to find their way in the vast world, can you guide them and help them... Grow Up?

The Gameplay


  • Experience a truly unique form of character movement / control, requiring both mouse and keyboard.
  • The easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, will keep you coming back for more.
  • Several worlds, each filled with unique puzzles, gimmicks and challenges, your braincells will surely be stimulated!
  • Levels require light puzzle-solving, technical precision, and speed.
  • If you're fast, you could earn copper, silver or even gold medals!
  • With the high skill ceiling and a focus on speed, you can brag about your time achievements to other people!
